code: import{observer}from'mobx-react-lite';import{useEffect}from'react';import CartState from'../../../store/CartState';import'./TotalPriceCounter.scss';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var TotalPriceCounter=observer(function(){var cartItems=CartState.cartItems,priceSum=CartState.priceSum;useEffect(function(){CartState.setPriceSum(cartItems.reduce(function(sum,item){return sum+item.count*(item.itemData.priceInfo.fullPrice-item.itemData.priceInfo.discountAmount);},0));},[cartItems]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"total-price-counter",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"total-price-counter__items-count",children:"\u0418\u0442\u043E\u0433\u043E: "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("b",{className:"total-price-counter__price",children:[priceSum," \u0440\u0443\u0431."]})]});});export default TotalPriceCounter;
